sentences.en: Any violation of subsection shall be punishable.
sentences.cn: 任何分节的违反都应予以惩罚.

sentences.en: Because contemptuous conduct interferes with the administration of justice, it is punishable, usually by fine or imprisonment.
sentences.cn: 因为藐视法庭行为干扰司法职能, 故应予惩罚, 通常可处罚金或监禁刑.

sentences.en: Child abuse is a punishable offense.
sentences.cn: 虐待儿童是一种该受惩处的违法行为.

sentences.en: Counterfeiting was still punishable with death at that epoch.
sentences.cn: 铸私钱在那个时代是要受极刑的.

sentences.en: Criminal contempt is crime that is punishable by fine or imprisonment or both.
sentences.cn: 咆哮公堂是犯罪行为,可处罚金,监禁或并处.

sentences.en: Criminal contempt is crime that is punishable fine or imprisonment or both.
sentences.cn: 严重的藐视法庭的行为是犯罪行为,可处罚金、监禁或并处.

sentences.en: Defacing a milk carton is punishable by a $ 10 fine.
sentences.cn: 损坏牛奶盒的外观可处以10美元的罚款.

sentences.en: Giving false informationis a punishable offence.
Infringement of the regulation is punishable by a fine.
Is defamation criminally punishable according to Chinese law?
sentences.cn: 根据中国法律,破坏名誉会受到刑事处罚 吗 ?

sentences.en: It is punishable by a beautiful natural scenery - oriented, both scenic spots comprehensive.
sentences.cn: 这里是一处以秀丽的自然风光为主, 兼有人文景观的综合风景区.

sentences.en: Putting salt on a railroad track may be punishable by death.
sentences.cn: 在铁轨上撒盐可能被处死.

sentences.en: The murder count could be punishable by the death penalty.
sentences.cn: 谋杀案件可能会受到死刑制裁.

sentences.en: They called on the authorities to make slavery a punishable offence.
sentences.cn: 他们呼吁当局将蓄奴定为一种应该受到惩罚的罪行。

sentences.en: To refuse baptism and to retract after baptism were crimes punishable by death.
sentences.cn: 凡拒绝受洗和受洗后反悔的都以死刑论罪.

sentences.en: Treason in this country is still punishable by death.

words.tran_cn: 严厉的；打击沉重的；精疲力尽的
惩罚；严厉对待；贪婪地吃喝

trans.tran_cn: （人或罪行）该处罚的，可惩罚的
trans.tran_en: If a crime is punishable in a particular way, anyone who commits it is punished in that way
